Package com.compendium.meeting.io

Class Summary
ArenaConnection This class handles the connections to Arena to upload/download xml data for the meeting and getting clock offset.
JabberConnection This class manages a meeting recording session or a meeting replay.
TripleStoreConnection Read and write data from/to the memetic meeting triple store.
